short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import Profiles into Visume from Social Forums, such as LinkedIn

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visume.Online is a recruitment process transformation that enables performance-based Hiring. Found any profile on LinkedIn that you find interesting? This bot imports the LinkedIn Profile directly into your account on Visume.
This bot should be invoked from the page on which you are viewing the LinkedIn profile.
